channel.title: Making not auto-member on login
channel.description: Ok when you login to my server your auto-member. [code]character-ismember = 1[/code] It just auto gives you that, could you tell me what I would change for them to be non-member on login? As in, tell me what to search for in .client and then what to change? I'm using a deltascape source. I don't want to have and change each character manually. Sincerely, 2xbladex2

item.title: Making not auto-member on login
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Edit the playerIsMember integer to 0 by default.

Read full topic

item.title: Making not auto-member on login
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

well have u got a command called makemem? or makememeber if u havent im not sure if there is a command for delta

Read full topic

item.title: Making not auto-member on login
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Ok when you login to my server your auto-member. character-ismember = 1
It just auto gives you that, could you tell me what I would change for them to be non-member on login?
As in, tell me what to search for in .client and then what to change? I’m using a deltascape source.
I don’t want to have and change each character manually.
Sincerely,
